snippet: Talks, hearings and earlier opinions are scoured for hints about how the Supreme Court will rule this month on same-sex marriage and the health care law.
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column notes that the public and the media are scouring previous remarks, from hearings to earlier opinions, in search for clues about how the Supreme Court will rule in cases considering same-sex marriage and a constitutional challenge to Pres Obama's health care reform law.
lead_paragraph: Talks, hearings and earlier opinions are scoured for hints about how the Supreme Court will rule this month on same-sex marriage and the health care law.

headline.main: Justices’ Words Are Combed for Clues as Major Decisions Loom at Court
headline.print_headline: Justices’ Words Are Combed for Clues as Major Decisions Loom at Court
